member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.DataBoundListBoxPivotBehavior
member.summary: Represents a class that blocks the pan effect on a control that is parent of the attached instance when the property is set to true.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.DataBoundListBoxPivotBehavior.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.DataBoundListBoxPivotBehavior.OnAttached
member.summary: Called after the behavior is attached to an AssociatedObject.
member.remarks: Override this to hook up functionality to the AssociatedObject.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.DataBoundListBoxPivotBehavior.OnDetaching
member.summary: Called when the behavior is being detached from its AssociatedObject, but before it has actually occurred.
member.remarks: Override this to unhook functionality from the AssociatedObject.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.PivotBlocker
member.summary: This class provides infrastructure for blocking gestures on a control. When gestures are blocked on a pivot control, the input is preserved for the content of the currently visible item, but pan operations to switch between pivot items are forbidden. This imblies hiding of all other headers and only leaving the selected pivot item's header visible.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.PivotBlocker.Start(Microsoft.Phone.Controls.Pivot)
member.summary: Starts blocking the pan operations of the given target pivot.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.PivotBlocker.Target
member.summary: Gets the current pivot that is blocked by this instance of .
